'''Heavy-Duty Restaurant Stove''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. Interacting with the Wide Stone Stove opens the [[Cooking]] menu.

The blueprint for Heavy-Duty Restaurant Stove is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
